values.title: Joe Klaas
values.desc: The truth will set you free but first it will piss you off

values.title: Charlotte Bront
values.desc: I am no bird and no net ensnares me I am a free human being with an independent will

values.title: Virginia Woolf
values.desc: Lock up your libraries if you like but there is no gate no lock no bolt that you can set upon the freedom of my mind

values.title: Coco Chanel
values.desc: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself Aloud

values.title: Mahatma Gandhi
values.desc: Freedom is not worth having if it does not include the freedom to make mistakes

values.title: Ralph Ellison
values.desc: When I discover who I am Ill be free

values.title: Sren Kierkegaard
values.desc: People demand freedom of speech as a compensation for the freedom of thought which they seldom use

values.title: Toni Morrison
values.desc: You wanna fly you got to give up the shit that weighs you down

values.title: Benjamin Franklin
values.desc: They who can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety deserve neither liberty nor safety

values.title: Bob Marley
values.desc: Better to die fighting for freedom then be a prisoner all the days of your life

values.title: David Foster Wallace
values.desc: The truth will set you free But not until it is finished with you

values.title: Toni Morrison
values.desc: Freeing yourself was one thing claiming ownership of that freed self was another

values.title: Paulo Coelho
values.desc: Now that she had nothing to lose she was free

values.title: C JoyBell C
values.desc: The unhappiest people in this world are those who care the most about what other people think
